site_name: Land at Bow East, Marshgate Lane, Stratford, London
description: Formal Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Screening Opinion under Regulation 6(3) of the Town and County Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) (England and Wales) Regulations 2017 (as amended) insofar as it relates to the proposed development for the construction and operation of a rail-fed concrete batching plant, weighbridge, aggregate and spoil storage areas, welfare facilities, landscaping, parking, access improvement works at Marshgate Lane and Wick Lane, and ancillary operations and an outline planning application with all matters reserved for a proposed workspace building fronting Marshgate Lane.
